extendedInfo.description: Count down to Christmas with this beautiful Advent Calendar.This is the full version of "Elf Advent(ure) Calendar 2012"! Have fun and help the Elves to save Christmas(Xmas)! Will they manage to wake the Frost Giant in time?* 24 exciting episodes!* A new game every day. * An exciting Elf Advent poem with hilarious verses* Beautifully drawn graphics* Entertainment for kids and the whole familyPlease support our small company by purchasing this full version!"Elf Advent(ure) Calendar 2012" is an Advent Calendar for kids. The story is told as a poem in 24 exciting episodes. Solve a puzzle each day to help the Elves on their adventurous journey in this thrilling Christmas journey! Story:The diligent Elves are almost finished with their Christmas preparations, as they notice the disaster: The lazy Frost Giant has overslept! Unfortunately he is responsible for one of the most important ingredients for a perfect Christmas: Snow! A delegation of Elves travels to the Giant's cave in order to wake the sleepy head, but this proves far more difficult than expected. Will they manage to put things right? And also in time to bring snow to everyone until Christmas Eve?This is a fun Christmas Calendar with cute puzzles for Children. It starts with the Elves working at Santa's workshop. There are different games, some animated puzzles, some jigsaw puzzles, other ones containing drawings for kids. At the end of each daily mini-game there funny animations await. Boys and girls alike will enjoy this collection of riddles, brainteasers and other fun things.The backgrounds of the puzzles are beautifully drawn christmas paintings by talented artists who have workedon amazing christmas cards and christmas stories for kids before.Merry Christmas and all the best from Ploosh!www.ploosh.netelf@ploosh.net

reviews.title: The Elf Adventure FULL
reviews.comment: This is great!  has  entertained my grandsons for two years now. Wish you had more, very creative
reviews.author: Susan Pinkard

reviews.title: Excellent!!
reviews.comment: My daughter and I look forward to the next day just to see what happens next. Absolutely love it. Great for the little ones 2. <3
reviews.author: Lisa Rodriguez

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Got this for my 3 year old and he loves it, he opens this calendar before he opens his chocolate calendar.
reviews.author: Claire Field

reviews.title: Been a great count down
reviews.comment: Really enjoyed this app better than the free app a day crap one, hopefully see you next year :-)
reviews.author: martin gardner

reviews.title: So cool
reviews.comment: My three children love this application they can\'t wait until the next day To see what Elves have planed for them to do thanks for a cool application
reviews.author: Angelina Buechler

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: Keeps playing the same scenes every day. Surely there should be a different one behind each door?
reviews.author: katie wilkinson

reviews.title: Lovely!
reviews.comment: My kids age 2 and 7 love this. They keep wanting to reopen the past doors and redo the puzzles. Must confess to having a sneaky go myself :) Lovely, worth every penny.
reviews.author: Catherine Murray

reviews.title: Decent advent calendar
reviews.comment: I used this on a Google Nexus 7 and the kids liked it, but a couple drawbacks are worth noting. First, when you complete a day\'s task, the ensuing screen shows too briefly. After days of trying to wake the giant, the kids  couldn\'t get a good look at him due to this. Also, most days had exciting outcomes, but a couple were pretty disappointing. That said, this is the best advent calendar I could find for Android.
reviews.author: Joshua Gulick

reviews.title: Good concept
reviews.comment: It was a cool idea and I guess kind of fun. The story wasn\'t really very interesting to follow and the things you had to do were sometimes confusing and bizarre. I may try it again next year, but I\'ll also look for something else.
reviews.author: Stacey Jamison

reviews.title: Fun for the kids & even adults that are still a kid @ heart!
reviews.comment: Fun for the kids & even adults that are still a kid @ heart!
reviews.author: Heather Horner

reviews.title: Too cute
reviews.comment: Cute! Love it!
reviews.author: Teresa Doni

reviews.title: Elf xmas countdown
reviews.comment: Excellent fun for adults and children alike
reviews.author: dave wall

reviews.title: Festive music
reviews.comment: Fun to do.
reviews.author: Camille Dreiling

reviews.title: Cute and fun
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for getting into the Christmas spirit! I can\'t wait to come back each day and help the elves with their adventure!
reviews.author: Amber Wheeler

reviews.title: Great christmas app!
reviews.comment: My kids love it!
reviews.author: Delbert Brewer

reviews.title: The elf adventure advent calendar
reviews.comment: Really fun and cute.
reviews.author: Reagan DeWitt

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: My son and I love this app,  he usually can\'t wait until the next day to see who the next elf will be. When have one of those Elf On The Shelf Elves and he loves to wake up and see where it has moved to in the night as it \"went\" to visit Santa during the night to make it\'s report about him.
reviews.author: Daria Tarrant

reviews.title: Great app but...
reviews.comment: It would be a lot better if it was a little different than the free version.  it\'s exactly the same.  My puzzle pieces haven\'t been able to fit anywhere the past couple of days.  The 19 & 20
reviews.author: Susan St. Marie

reviews.title: Elf Adventure
reviews.comment: I think this is great, even my 2 year old grandson could do this.
reviews.author: Kathleen Trana

reviews.title: Elf advent calendar
reviews.comment: Brilliant graphics, pictures and music. Great for all kids from 1 to 100.
reviews.author: Teresa Wilson
